name: LYSONKOV OLEKSANDR
summary: I’m a Senior Full-Stack and Mobile Developer with over 9 years of experience turning complex ideas into fast, reliable, and user-friendly products.I build for both web and mobile, blending strong front-end experiences with clean, scalable back-end systems. My main tools are React, Next.js, React Native, Node.js, Angular, and Laravel, and I’m always focused on performance, clean architecture, and great UX. Over the years, I’ve led and delivered projects across e-commerce, ERP, and enterprise-level platforms. I care deeply about details — from pixel-perfect UI to smooth API integration and secure authentication systems. I love working with teams that care about quality, clear communication, and building products people actually enjoy using. If you’re building something ambitious and need someone who can think full-stack and move fast — let’s connect.

experience.title: Senior Frontend & Full Stack Engineer
experience.summary: Currently building and maintaining large-scale web and mobile applications, focusing on quality, performance, and long-term maintainability.
highlights: Developing and optimizing complex front-end systems using React and Next.js.
Built reusable UI components library with NgRx state management, reducing development time by 40%
Collaborating closely with UI/UX designers and backend engineers for seamless delivery.
Continuously improving performance, code quality, and deployment pipelines.

experience.title: Full Stack (E-Commerce)
experience.summary: I owned full-stack development for an e-commerce platform — from database and APIs to front-end experience — focusing on performance, security, and user flow.
highlights: Built the platform using Next.js, Laravel and MySQL.
Designed and connected REST APIs for smooth data exchange and modular scalabili
Improved SEO, site speed, and conversion flow through careful optimization.

experience.title: Full Stack & Mobile Developer
experience.summary: Here I moved into full-stack and mobile development, helping build ERP and mobile systems with a strong focus on reliability, security, and smooth UX.
highlights: Developed ERP modules using React-Native and Node.js, handling front-end logic and back-end APIs.
Built reusable React Native components and implemented secure token-based authentication (OAuth integrations with Google, Microsoft, Facebook).
Delivered consistent pixel-perfect, responsive layouts with strong API integrations.

experience.title: Frontend Web Developer
experience.summary: I started my career focused on building clean, responsive landing pages that looked great and performed well. This role gave me a strong base in front-end craft and design precision.
highlights: Built and maintained responsive marketing and product pages using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript, jQuery.
Worked closely with designers to deliver pixel-perfect UI and consistent branding.
Improved load times and front-end performance through optimized code and assets.

education.description: Major concentration in Software Development, Algorithm Design, and Database Management Systems with distinction.
